allow:

- Update biome.jsonc schema to latest version
- Configure VS Code settings with Biome as default formatter
- Add VS Code recommended extensions
- Add typecheck, lint, and format scripts
- Enable Turbopack for dev mode
- Configure turbopack.root to fix workspace detection
